messages.subject: famous samurai
messages.msgSnippet: as someone mentioned earlier on famous japanese generals surely adimiral yamamoto is the most well known japanese commander outside of japan. Im usure if his
messages.messageBody:
as someone mentioned earlier on famous japanese generals surely
adimiral yamamoto is the most well known japanese commander outside
of japan. Im usure if his family history is of any samurai history
but he deserves the same amount of respect.
